attributes.review: when you download the app you think everything is fine then when you open it a man crawls out and poops in your hand. if you think this is the end you’re wrong. he also has a gun. and now he’s making you eat it. anyway. acab. frick trump. black lives matter.
attributes.title: painful

attributes.review: This app is garbage. It’s glitchy & shuts down all the time. I had to take it off because it kept sending me racist propaganda.

attributes.review: This app is absolutely HORRIBLE. I don’t even support trump I just wanted to see what the app was about. It’s super glitchy and almost gave my phone a virus😤
